short_summary: Supply of Firewood to Jasper National Park
description: The contract requires the supply and delivery of firewood to two campgrounds and one woodlot in Jasper National Park, Alberta. Supplies will be required between May 1st, 2023 and March 31st, 202;4. Approximately 1200 cord of wood will be distributed annually.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
